      • zipFiles

        public static java.io.File zipFiles​(java.io.File[] files,
                                    java.io.File dest,
                                    boolean compress)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Compress the specified files into a ZIP file
        Parameters:
        files - the files to zip.
        dest - the destination file.
        compress - True to compress the ZIP, false to store
        Returns:
        the destination file if the zip is successful, otherwise null.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - in case there are any io exceptions.
